title: C24 Unlocked Smartphone, 5.5” Display, 4G LTE Volte, Android 13 Go, Octa-Core, 3GB RAM + 16GB Storage (Expandable 64GB), Removable 2300mAh Battery, Single SIM, Type-C, Includes Charger & Case
description: C24 Unlocked Smartphone – Compact, Reliable, and Efficient The C24 is a compact and affordable smartphone designed for users who need essential smartphone features in a lightweight and easy-to-use design. With 4G LTE VoLTE support, a 5.5” display, and a removable 2300mAh battery, the C24 is perfect for everyday communication and entertainment. 📱 Clear & Convenient Display Enjoy a 5.5” screen with 480x960 resolution, making it ideal for browsing, messaging, and social media. Its compact size ensures comfortable one-hand operation. 🚀 Smooth & Efficient Performance The C24 runs on Android 13 Go, optimized for faster performance with lightweight apps. With a 1.6GHz Octa-Core processor, 3GB RAM, and 16GB storage (expandable up to 64GB), you can multitask smoothly without slowdowns. 📡 Stay Connected with 4G LTE & VoLTE Experience strong and stable network connectivity with support for multiple LTE bands and VoLTE compatibility, ensuring high-quality calls and faster internet speeds. 🔋 Removable Battery for Flexibility The 2300mAh removable Lithium-ion battery allows you to swap batteries easily, ensuring you stay powered throughout the day. 📸 Basic Photography & Clear Audio Capture moments with 2MP front and rear cameras, ideal for video calls and simple photos. The 1217 Box speaker and 3.5mm AUX jack provide clear audio quality for music and calls. 🎁 Everything You Need in the Box The C24 comes with essential accessories, including a Type-C USB cable, charger, TPU case, and user manual, so you’re ready to go right out of the box! Upgrade to the C24 Handset for a compact, reliable, and budget-friendly smartphone experience! 🚀📱
